title: N172 Nick Bradley Worcester Batting for Trade

posts.post_title: N172 Nick Bradley Worcester Batting for Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: bigfish
Taking offers on Bradley.  Worcester is a tough team.  

Looking for Cobbs, N172 Hofers, Rare t206 backs, crease free t206's in bulk, Uncle Jacks, GCM, Ruths, and a delong Gehrig.  Card is graded an SGC 50 with a super image.

tp7161@yahoo.com
